TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INotation implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Org.W3c.Dom.INode, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: This interface represents a notation declared in the DTD.

remarks.para: This interface represents a notation declared in the DTD. A notation either declares, by name, the format of an unparsed entity (see of the XML 1.0 specification []), or is used for formal declaration of processing instruction targets (see of the XML 1.0 specification []). The nodeName attribute inherited from Node is set to the declared name of the notation.
The DOM Core does not support editing Notation nodes; they are therefore readonly.
A Notation node does not have any parent.

Docs.summary: The public identifier of this notation.

remarks.para: The public identifier of this notation. If the public identifier was not specified, this is null.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getSystemId", "()Ljava/lang/String;", "GetGetSystemIdHandler:Org.W3c.Dom.INotationInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: The system identifier of this notation.

remarks.para: The system identifier of this notation. If the system identifier was not specified, this is null. This may be an absolute URI or not.
